ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bard equip (was Katanas)
ygData.msgSnippet: Necro s can use thier life taps on that eye.  Really nice so they dont have to be healed when in thier mana regen bone form.  Especially after 49 BoD is
ygData.messageBody:
Necro's can use thier life taps on that eye. Really nice so they dont have
to be healed when in thier mana regen bone form. Especially after 49 BoD is
great!! Still trying to get the Holgresh Elder Beads for my friends necro so
he can make his own Eye's.

Mu
